Resizable¶

JavaScript¶

Plugins.fn.resizable(resize_class, click_spacing)¶

Makes the current element resizable

Arguments:
  • resize_class (string) – Class applied to the current element during the resizing process.
  • click_spacing (number) – The area inside the borders of the element which can be clicked to start the resizing process (in px).
Returns:

An object providing enable and disable functions.
